Yeah i as shizas said I pretty much remember Paul raping Lillia whe they were younger. After that she went to train as a maid. And met paul and worked for him and fell for him.
Something that surprised me is that this story is not tagged as NTR, since is the fashion now. xDD

@Yans-desu Actually, I think @Raidacus refer to what happens BEFORE Lillia works as maid at Paul's house. It's described in the LN, when Lillia and Paul were younger, studying sword together, Paul rape Lillia (kinda halfway because she had a crush on him). After that she got injured, and started to work as maid for some royal people, whose end up having some... "hardcore fetish" (??) I don't remember if she got raped there too, but almost... I'm reading the manga, but I have readed all the LN too, and between those are a lot of difference. The anime is going more like the LN than like the manga.
It's sad the author didn't continue with Aisha
I'll gladly wait for Aisha's turn.
The story you're talking about must be what Rudeus said at the time and basically what he said there was a lie so that the family wouldn't be broken and all that stuff

@Raidacus, In no way did Paul rape her it was actually her tempting Paul please get your things right. If you don't believe me then you probably must have only watched the Anime and not have read the manga since I have been reading the manga for more than 3 years now.

Why are there so many unwholesome Mushoku Tensei doujins? Is it because the normie autors haven't seen Rudeus married with his girls?

And yes, Lilia should be kinda used to it. I'd expect her to show a stoic, emotionless face since, apparently, not only did Paul rape her, but later when she worked in the royal castle, she was subjected to all maner of perversions and horrors, to the point where she looks back at her rape fondly. Like, she literally says it wasn't that bad all things considered, when compared to what she went through as a royal maid.
